item.title: Animating Strava Data
item.description: As a side project, I wrote some code to automatically pull my data from the Strava API and visualize it with some cool R packages. I documented the code on GitHub so that anyone can do this with their own Strava data.

item.title: Introducing DataCheck: A tool to automatically prevent privacy violations
item.description: Our prior work demonstrated that 5-10% of open datasets contain potential privacy violations, so we developed a tool to help. DataCheck can automatically scan a dataset and flag 14 types of common privacy violations before a researcher makes their data public. Available as both a Web app and R package, the tool runs locally so there is no risk of exposing participant data during the scan. It was validated on both live and simulated datasets to be >98% accurate.
